name: Lights in the Dark (GreenCreeps)
description:
☁lights in the dark☁

arrow keys to move or use asdw

use mouse pointer to aim but watch out for the scary monster, wopy. left click with your mouse to flash on his face also invite your friends to join even tho this game is kinda boring.


an online game from a tutorial

                              this is a horror game

       if you don't like horror games then don't play it

i made this game for a studio that i have a friend with
